column5: Hi guys Just curious if there is an 'on-line version' of tackle and bait shops across the Province or where one would find something like this? thanks guys      Thanks Kistler Rods & Whopper Baits

Here are a couple of links I saved from OFC (way back when)...  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=30200&st=0entry322849  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=31562
Google maps and type "fishing" sometimes surprises me with fishing stores I never knew about.
